SqlOutput.Sql: CASE WHEN CASE WHEN SIGN(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) = SIGN(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)) THEN (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) - (FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)/COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) ELSE (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) - (CEIL(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)/COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) END >=0 THEN CEIL(CASE WHEN SIGN(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) = SIGN(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)) THEN (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) - (FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)/COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) ELSE (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) - (CEIL(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)/COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) END ) ELSE FLOOR(CASE WHEN SIGN(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) = SIGN(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)) THEN (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) - (FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)/COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) ELSE (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) - (CEIL(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0)/COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) END ) END
